```{r deathrate, echo = F, message = F, warning = F, fig.cap = "Índice de mortalidad anual (por cada 100 mil habitantes) por década a causa de catastrofes naturales, 1900'2015"}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
disasters = tibble(
  decade = seq(1900, 2010, 10),
  `Sequías` = c(7.65,0.47,24.2,0,14.58,0,4.54,0.29,1.15,0.01,0,0.05),
  `Terremotos` = c(1.02,0.35,2.81,1.08,0.68,0.08,0.16,1.08,0.12,0.18,0.7,0.61),
  `Temperaturas Extremas` = c(0,0,0,0.01,0,0.01,0,0,0.01,0.02,0.14,0.16),
  `Inundaciones` = c(0,0.56,0.02,19.85,0.43,7.46,0.1,0.13,0.11,0.17,0.08,0.08),
  `Deslizamientos` = c(0,0,0,0,0.07,0.01,0.02,0.02,0.01,0.01,0.01,0.02),
  `Tormentas` = c(0.11,0.33,0.61,0.43,0.54,0.11,0.4,0.88,0.1,0.37,0.26,0.04),
  `Actividad Volcánica` = c(0.26,0.04,0.03,0.01,0.01,0.02,0.01,0,0.05,0,0,0)
) %>% pivot_longer(-decade, names_to = "hazard", values_to = "death_rate") 

library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
g = ggplot(disasters, aes(y = death_rate, x = hazard)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = hazard), show.legend = F) +
  # scale_y_continuous(breaks = 1:7, labels = unique(disasters$hazard)) +
  transition_manual(decade) +
  scico::scale_fill_scico_d() + 
  coord_flip() +
  # view_follow(fixed_x = T) +
  # scale_y_log10() +
  # facet_wrap(~decade) +
  labs(
    title = "Índice de mortalidad anual por peligors naturales, 1900-2015",
    subtitle = 'Década: {current_frame}', 
    caption = "Gráfico modificado de ourworldindata.org. Fuente: EMDAT (2017) OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database.",
    x = '', y = 'Índice de mortalidad (c/100 mil hab.)') +
  theme_xaringan()
```

```{r, echo = F, fig.align = 'center', fig.width = 15, fig.height = 8, warning= F, message = F}
g
```

class: center

.pull-left[
## Peligros naturales

.left[
- Fenómenos naturales
- Eventos inesperados y/o incontrolables
- Con efectos *negativos* para el **medio ambiente**

.note[Fuente y más info: [nonaturaldisasters.com](https://www.nonaturaldisasters.com/), Infografía: <a href='https://www.freepik.com/vectors/map'>Map vector created by macrovector - www.freepik.com</a>]
]

![:scale 50%](figs/nathaz.png)
]

.pull-right[
## Desastres

.left[
- Disrupción del funcionamiento de una comunidad o sociedad
- Causas: eventos peligrosos + exposición + vulnerabilidad
- Mal llamados "desastres naturales"
]

[![:scale 30%](figs/nonatdis.jpg)](https://www.nonaturaldisasters.com/)
]


**"Los peligros naturales son inevitables, el impacto que tienen en la sociedad no lo es."**
